TopicTitle: Got Fallout 4 Pre-loaded and ready to go aaand major KSP update.

Articles.Content: I know, I'll set up dual monitors and play KSP with one hand and Fallout 4 with the other!

I knew this would happen. I predicted it!

I just hope my computer doesn't catch fire trying to run Fallout 4.

Your "life" is officially over...

Your friends and family will say "What ever happened to Netskimmer/insert real name for family and IRL friends*? Haven't seen him for a month now!"

...

*Unless your friends and family already call you Netskimmer, in which case, no major changes to your "life" will occur!

It's gonna be interesting after 10 or 12 hours straight ... "I can't fit this Deathclaw in the command module and Jeb's Power Armor doesn't fit Gaaahhhh!!!

- - - Updated - - -

Damn, you really did predict it! So far your predictions are more accurate than that of the entire Mayan Culture. Well done!
